Package com.flipfit.business

Class GymOwnerBusiness

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.GymOwnerBusiness
All Implemented Interfaces:
GymOwnerBusinessInterface
public class GymOwnerBusiness extends Object implements GymOwnerBusinessInterface
Author:
Soham Jadhav Business logic class for gym owner operations. This class handles the business-level interactions for a gym owner, including managing their profile, gyms, and slots. It acts as a bridge between the presentation layer and the data access layer (DAO).
